column4: Any way to turn an .iso into an .img usable by PXElinux?  I'm trying to avoid the netboot that downloads files and instead have an entire install img be the boot.
If you setup a local apt mirror then the netboot CD at least won't need to go out to the internet.
so then it'd still "retrieve" the install files, but from the local apt mirror which can have the strict version requirements I need?
